movies.Title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
movies.Plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

movies.Title: X-Men: Dark Phoenix
movies.Plot: Jean Grey begins to develop incredible powers that corrupt and turn her into a Dark Phoenix, causing the X-Men to decide if her life is worth more than all of humanity.

movies.Title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.Plot: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos

movies.Title: X2: X-Men United
movies.Writer: Zak Penn, David Hayter, Bryan Singer
movies.Actors: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Halle Berry
movies.Plot: When anti-mutant Colonel William Stryker kidnaps Professor X and attacks his school, the X-Men must ally with their archenemy Magneto to stop him.

movies.Title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
movies.Writer: Ryan Coogler, Joe Robert Cole, Stan Lee
movies.Actors: Letitia Wright, Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira
movies.Plot: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. 20 wins & 148 nominations total

movies.Title: Ant-Man & The Wasp: Quantum Quarantine
movies.Actors: Ross K. Foad, Will Bergman, Lissa Dittmann
movies.Plot: Hank Pym has discovered a way to save the original Wasp, but when Ghost and Yellowjacket arrives it's up to Ant-Man and The Wasp to save her in time.

movies.Title: Ant-Man
movies.Writer: Edgar Wright, Joe Cornish, Adam McKay
movies.Actors: Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas, Corey Stoll
movies.Plot: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, pull off a plan that will save the world.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Award4 wins & 34 nominations total
